title: Name every featured game mode in chronological order three times before a rioter posts

replies.body:
Nearly 24 hours, and only got one game mode named. Well done people!

(Katey, you're awesome!)
It's because no one cares about this... Serves no purpose. And yet important enough to get a red post lol.
I saw this when it was initially posted, but figured I'd play nice and wait a bit. :D
Hahaha can't escape Katey's boards omnipresence.
You realize this can be done about 20 times before a Rioter even sees this thread right?

yeesh, giving us alot of time here
is google senpai alowed to help me?
